statement.p:
Consider the region bounded by the curves {{yx}} + {{xy}}^2 = {{c}} and x = {{pmy}}.
Sketch the region and draw a representative slice. (Should your slice be horizontal or vertical?)
Write down a definite integral that computes the total area between the two curves. (It may be helpful to write down an expression for the approximate area of your slice.)
Compute the value of your integral.
